body_text:
1.git/models/research# git log
commit 17fa528
tensorflow# git log
commit 1e43819
Author: Amit Patankar amitpatankar@google.com
git checkout -b v1.11.0-rc0 v1.11.0-rc0
2.
git diff object_detection/model_main.py

config = tf.estimator.RunConfig(model_dir=FLAGS.model_dir)



distribution = tf.contrib.distribute.MirroredStrategy()
config = tf.estimator.RunConfig(model_dir=FLAGS.model_dir, train_distribute=distribution, eval_distribute=distribution)
3
models/research# python object_detection/model_main.py --pipeline_config_path=object_detection/samples/configs/ssd_mobilenet_v1_quantized_300x300_coco14_sync.config --logtostderr --model_dir=/data/checkpoint/del2 --num_gpus=4
body:
1.git/models/research# git log
commit 17fa52864bfc7a7444a8b921d8a8eb1669e14ebd
tensorflow# git log
commit 1e438195399650604fb3aa3a53c67339f1167882
Author: Amit Patankar <amitpatankar@google.com>
git checkout -b v1.11.0-rc0 v1.11.0-rc0
2.
# git diff object_detection/model_main.py
-  config = tf.estimator.RunConfig(model_dir=FLAGS.model_dir)
+
+  distribution = tf.contrib.distribute.MirroredStrategy()
+  config = tf.estimator.RunConfig(model_dir=FLAGS.model_dir, train_distribute=distribution, eval_distribute=distribution)
3
models/research# python object_detection/model_main.py --pipeline_config_path=object_detection/samples/configs/ssd_mobilenet_v1_quantized_300x300_coco14_sync.config --logtostderr --model_dir=/data/checkpoint/del2 --num_gpus=4
